Serveyoursite SSD VPS starting at $5/month. OpenVZ virtualization with your choice of Linux Distro, between CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian and CloudLinux.

**Server Specs: **   
*768 MB RAM  
*30GB SSD Space  
*1000 GB Bandwidth  
*Dedicated Ip (IPv4) IPv6 also available!  
*Ips in USA, Whitelabel and Offshore  
  
All Servers come with 99.99% uptime guarantee and are instantly activated. Order today and use coupon code hotdeals to take and extra 10% off your purchase.  

If you have any questions feel free to contact us on live chat or open a support or sales ticket [here](http://www.serveyoursite.com/vps-hosting/ssd-vps-hosting)
